text:
Yes, but keep in mind that if there are existing .RCT files from backups of the
virtual machines the virtual machines may not start until those files are
deleted or renamed. 
Philip Elder MCTS 
Senior Technical Architect 
Microsoft High Availability MVP
 
E-mail:  
Phone: +1 (780) 458-2028 
Web: www.mpecsinc.com
 
Blog: blog.mpecsinc.com
 
Twitter: Twitter.com/MPECSInc
 
Skype: MPECSInc. 
Please note: Although we may sometimes respond to email, text and phone calls
instantly at all hours of the day, our regular business hours are 8:00 AM - 5:00
PM, Monday thru Friday.

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] October patches

Yes, but keep in mind that if there are existing .RCT files from backups of the
virtual machines the virtual machines may not start until those files are
deleted or renamed.

From: 'Shimon Kerzner' via PatchManagement <patchmanagement@googlegroups.com>
Sent: Monday, November 20, 2023 11:26
To: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Subject: RE: [patchmanagement] October patches 
There are reports that the RCT issue is fixed in November. 
https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/azure-stack/starting-vms-may-fail-after-installation-of-10-2023-cu-when/m-p/3956844/highlight/true
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftechcommunity.microsoft.com%2Ft5%2Fazure-stack%2Fstarting-vms-may-fail-after-installation-of-10-2023-cu-when%2Fm-p%2F3956844%2Fhighlight%2Ftrue&data=05%7C01%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C1945153cf3c8407794ac08dbea043a7c%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638361076165351744%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=EEaB2FyrqCh6GpR8EnhCnCdEtkt2UJlozvw3mgHHJnk%3D&reserved=0] 
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/answers/questions/1390624/virtual-machines-failed-to-start-after-installing?page=4#answers:~:text=Hi%20Dennis%2C%20it,0%20votes
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flearn.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Fanswers%2Fquestions%2F1390624%2Fvirtual-machines-failed-to-start-after-installing%3Fpage%3D4%23answers%3A~%3Atext%3DHi%2520Dennis%252C%2520it%2C0%2520votes&data=05%7C01%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C1945153cf3c8407794ac08dbea043a7c%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638361076165351744%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=cPULjl8noup%2FmdLjKxRgqBayjhM3D%2BENHWKtITX%2F7pA%3D&reserved=0]
